creditline: Gift of Donna and Cargill MacMillan Jr.
description: head covering with long back tail; grey fabric with knit trim at front and on back edges of similar motifs and colors, but different gauges; back tail stitched with row of large bright-colored organic shapes with yellow scroll and purple zigzag borders; thread tassels at bottom of hood; lined in black, white, blue and green ikat, and red, white and blue floral fabric
title: Hood
